spec_data.Name: screenie
spec_data.Description:
Screenie is a small and lightweight screen wrapper that is
designed to be a session handler that simplifies the process of
administrating detached jobs by providing an interactive menu.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Thu 27 Jul 2017 05:48:49 PM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: A small and lightweight screen wrapper
